attributes.action: look into the proposed budget cuts of Northampton Borough Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: who propose to cut grants to leisure and cultural facilities in Northampton, including the Royal and Derngate theatres (that have recently reopened after spending £15 million on refurbuishment) and the proposed closure of Lings forum sports centre, while enjoying the benefits of first class rail travel, entertaining visiting dignataries at the most expensive restaurants and increasing their own budget for allowances way over the current levels of inflation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
